description: Policy prompts for Wealth Management PolicyDraftAgent evaluation

prompts.description: Create a policy for investment suitability compliance
prompts.context: We manage assets for clients with varying risk profiles (Conservative, Moderate, Aggressive). Each profile has maximum allocations to different asset classes. We need to monitor and enforce these limits automatically.

prompts.description: Create a policy for portfolio concentration risk management
prompts.context: Clients should not have excessive concentration in any single security, sector, or asset class. Single stock positions should not exceed 10% of portfolio value, and sector exposure should not exceed 25%.

prompts.description: Create a policy for beneficiary designation review
prompts.context: Beneficiary designations should be reviewed annually and after any major life event (marriage, divorce, birth, death). Accounts with outdated designations pose legal and operational risk.

prompts.description: Create a policy for performance monitoring and client communication
prompts.context: We need to monitor portfolio performance against benchmarks. Sustained underperformance (more than 2% below benchmark for 2+ consecutive quarters) should trigger mandatory client outreach and strategy review.

prompts.description: Create a policy for estate planning review triggers
prompts.context: High-net-worth clients (>$5M AUM) should have annual estate planning reviews. Clients should be contacted when estate tax exemption changes affect their planning or when trust funding gaps are identified.
